text: Overiamɨn apengan itir bizir gumazamiziba amiba, kɨ ua dagh nɨghnɨgha fo, da derazir puvatɨ. Gumazir kuraba gumazamiziba dɨkabɨra osɨmtɨziba me garɨzima, me bar puvɨram arai. Ezɨ men akurvaghan gumaziba puvatɨ. Kɨ gari, gavmanɨn gavgavim, gumazir kurabaram akurvasi. Kamaghɨn, gavman uaghan men akurvazir puvatɨ.
